thread.title: I Drank Vinegar For A Week To Heal My Gut. Here's What Happened
thread.title_full: I Drank Vinegar For A Week To Heal My Gut. Here's What Happened

author: Suja
title: I Drank Vinegar For A Week To Heal My Gut. Here's What Happened
text:
I Drank Vinegar For A Week To Heal My Gut. Here's What Happened Sponsored by Suja March 22, 2017 5:45 AM SHARES 0 
Drinking vinegar is one of the most exciting new beverages to hit the health world in recent months, with touted benefits ranging from improved digestion and gut health to greater immunity. But we wanted to know if it actually stood up to the hype, so we partnered with Suja Juice and enlisted mbg team member Lauren Rubin to drink one bottle daily for a week. Here's what happened. ADVERTISEMENT Suja

All juices, smoothies, waters and drinking vinegars are cold-pressured using High Pressure Processing (HPP) to kill any harmful bacteria and preserve maximum nutrition and taste. With a wide range of cold-pressed organic offerings, Suja has a juice, smoothie, enhanced water or drinking vinegar for every lifestyle.
